title: String Is ISO Formatted Date
description: In this lab, we will explore how to determine if a given string is a valid date string in the simplified extended ISO format (ISO 8601). We will use the Date constructor and its associated methods to create a Date object from the string and check its validity. By the end of the lab, you will have a better understanding of how to work with dates in JavaScript and how to validate them using the ISO format.

meta.title: Validating ISO Formatted Dates in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to check if a given string is a valid ISO 8601 date format using JavaScript's Date object.
